ctx: intros A B R H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: pose proof (ChoiceFacts.fun_choice_and_small_drinker_imp_omniscient_fun_choice ChoiceFacts.FunctionalChoice_on ChoiceFacts.SmallDrinker'sParadox A B) as H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type B : A -> Type R : forall x : A, B x -> Prop H1 : FiniteT A H2 : forall x : A, exists y : B x, R x y The term "ChoiceFacts.FunctionalChoice_on" has type "Type -> Type -> Prop" while it is expected to have type "forall A B : Type, inhabited B -> ChoiceFacts.FunctionalChoice_on A B" (cannot unify "Prop" and "inhabited B0 -> ChoiceFacts.FunctionalChoice_on A0 B0").

original: intros A B R H1 H2. pose proof (ChoiceFacts.fun_choice_and_small_drinker_imp_omniscient_fun_choice ChoiceFacts.FunctionalChoice_on ChoiceFacts.SmallDrinker'sParadox A B) as H3. apply H3. - intros x. apply FiniteT. - apply H2.
